TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class HierarchicalDataSourceControl : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataSourceControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource
Public MustInherit Class HierarchicalDataSourceControl Inherits Control Implements IHierarchicalDataSource
public ref class HierarchicalDataSourceControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IHierarchicalDataSource

summary.span: 提供代表階層式資料之資料來源控制項的基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for data source controls that represent hierarchical data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援的控制項資料繫結架構，可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至資料，並加以呈現一致的方式。ASP.NET supports a controls data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data and present it in a consistent fashion. 繫結至資料的 web 伺服器控制項的稱為資料繫結控制項，並協助繫結的類別稱為資料來源控制項。Web server controls that bind to data are called data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate binding are called data source controls. 資料來源控制項可以表示任何資料來源： 檔案、 資料流、 關聯式資料庫、 商務物件等等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a file, a stream, a relational database, a business object, and so on. 資料繫結控制項，不論來源或基礎資料的格式一致的方式中的資料來源控制項呈現資料。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 代表階層式資料的資料來源控制項衍生自類別，而代表項目清單或資料表的資料的資料來源控制項衍生自類別。Data source controls that represent hierarchical data derive from the class, while data source controls that represent lists or tables of data derive from the class. 類別是基底實作介面，定義要擷取的資料來源控制項相關聯的階層式資料來源檢視物件的單一方法， 。The class is the base implementation of the interface, which defines a single method to retrieve hierarchical data source view objects associated with the data source control, . 您可以將資料來源控制項的組合視為物件和其相關聯的檢視，在基礎資料上，稱為資料來源檢視物件。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated views on the underlying data, called data source view objects. 表示表格式資料的資料來源控制項通常只有一個具名的檢視，與相關聯時類別支援資料來源檢視的資料來源控制項所代表的階層式資料的每個層級。While data source controls that represent tabular data are typically associated with only one named view, the class supports a data source view for each level of hierarchical data that the data source control represents. 階層式資料的層級由唯一的階層式路徑，傳遞至方法中的`viewPath`參數。The level of hierarchical data is identified by a unique hierarchical path, passed to the method in the `viewPath` parameter. 每個物件定義的資料來源控制項表示，階層的層級的功能，並執行例如 insert、 update、 delete 和排序作業。Each object defines the capabilities of a data source control for the hierarchical level represented, and performs operations such as insert, update, delete, and sort. Web 伺服器控制項衍生自類別，例如，使用階層式資料來源控制項繫結至階層式資料。Web server controls that derive from the class, such as , use hierarchical data source controls to bind to hierarchical data. 資料來源控制項會實作為控制項，讓宣告式的持續性，並選擇性地允許參與狀態管理。Data source controls are implemented as controls to enable declarative persistence and to optionally permit participation in state management. 資料來源控制項沒有視覺化呈現，並因此不支援佈景主題。Data source controls have no visual rendering, and therefore do not support themes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充抽象類別和類別，並實作和介面來建立階層式資料來源擷取檔案系統的控制項資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the abstract class and the class, and implement the and interfaces to create a hierarchical data source control that retrieves file system information. `FileSystemDataSource`控制項可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至物件，並顯示基本檔案系統資訊。The `FileSystemDataSource` control enables Web server controls to bind to objects and display basic file system information. `FileSystemDataSource`在範例中的類別提供的實作方法，擷取`FileSystemDataSourceView`物件。The `FileSystemDataSource` class in the example provides the implementation of the method, which retrieves a `FileSystemDataSourceView` object. `FileSystemDataSourceView`物件會從基礎資料存放區，在此情況下在 Web 伺服器上的檔案系統資訊來擷取資料。The `FileSystemDataSourceView` object retrieves the data from the underlying data storage, in this case the file system information on the Web server. 基於安全性考量，檔案系統資訊 localhost 中使用資料來源控制項時，才會顯示、 已驗證的案例，並與使用資料來源控制項的 Web Form 網頁所在的虛擬目錄，才會啟動。For security purposes, file system information is displayed only if the data source control is being used in a localhost, authenticated scenario, and only starts with the virtual directory that the Web Forms page using the data source control resides in. 最後，兩個類別可實作和提供給包裝物件`FileSystemDataSource`使用。Finally, two classes that implement and are provided to wrap the objects that `FileSystemDataSource` uses. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式將繫結控制項使用的檔案系統資料`FileSystemDataSource`範例。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to file system data using the `FileSystemDataSource` example. [!code-aspx-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1/CS/webform7cs.aspx#50)] [!code-aspx-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1/VB/webform7vb.aspx#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這方法提供的預設實作類別，只會傳回`null`。This method provides the default implementation for the class, which simply returns `null`. 類別衍生自類別覆寫這個方法，並提供實作以傳回衍生自強型別的檢視。Classes that derive from the class override this method and provide an implementation to return a strongly typed view that derives from . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法擴充的類別中類別，以傳回強型別物件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a class that extends the class to return a strongly typed object. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnDataSourceChanged (EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDataSourceChanged (e As EventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnDataSourceChanged(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會告知資料繫結控制項的基礎資料來源或快取在記憶體中的資料已變更、 控制項應重新繫結，而且應該執行任何所需的工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source or the data cached in memory has changed, that the control should rebind, and that any necessary work should be performed. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由用戶端呼叫時操作為介面。The method is called by clients when a is manipulated as an interface. 它會委派至方法，衍生類別覆寫以傳回強型別物件。It delegates to the method, which derived classes override to return strongly typed objects.
